name: Fluss

skillInfo.name: Tempest Blade
skillInfo.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it 3 times, dealing a total of ??? P.DMG. If the target is not a Hero, inflicts a total of ??? additional P.DMG over 5 sec.

skills.light: Ignores DEF when there is only 1 enemy.
skills.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, cooldown is reduced by 6%.

effect: [Tempest Blade] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and upon every use, increases DMG by 4%. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

[Tempest Blade] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and upon every use, increases DMG by 10%. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

skillInfo.name: Flashstep
skillInfo.description: Moves to the enemy with the highest ATK and Inflicts Silence for 2 sec. Own M.DMG reduction is increased by 300 for 5 sec. Engraves the enemy with a Mark for 10 sec, and own attack prioritizes the Marked target. When attacking enemies inflicted with Mark, deals ??? extra P.DMG.

skills.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.

effect: [Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 20% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.

skillInfo.name: Bloody Petals
skillInfo.description: Deals a total of ??? P.DMG to an enemy over 16 hits, and suppresses the target while casting. This DMG ignores the target's Block effects.

skills.light: Each Critical Hit increases the last hit's DMG by 10%.
skills.dark: While in cooldown, auto attack DMG is boosted by 50%.

effect: [Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 20% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.

skillInfo.name: Spell Cutter
skillInfo.description: Every 10 sec, upon taking M.DMG, deals ??? P.DMG to the attacker, and dodges all M.ATK for 3 sec.

skills.light: Upon dodging, raise own ATK by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times.
skills.dark: Has a 30% chance to stun enemies for 3 sec.

uniqueTreasure.name: Sealed Confidential Letter
effect: [Spell Cutter] Upon activation, increases own ATK Spd by 200 for 4 sec. The duration of the dodge effect increases by 1 sec.

dark: Upon attacking, deal extra P.DMG equal to 20% of ATK to the enemy. There is also a 10% chance of dealing double P.DMG and dispelling positive effects.

profile.dislikes: Those who do not understand romance

background.story: As the son of the commander of the Imperial Knights, he has received rigorous training since early childhood to become a proper swordsman. No one can question his title as the fastest swordsman in the imperial palace. The number of enemy knights he felled in the fields of battle is a testament to his skills. He quickly rose to the rank as the vice-captain of the Imperial Guard and is the subject of everyone's admiration. Although he is aware of his beautiful appearance, he detests those who approach him for his outer beauty. He considers inner beauty more important than what is visible. However, he's slightly hypocritical in that he occasionally falls for his own beauty.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A set of enchanted weapons bestowed upon Fluss's grandfather, a knight hailing from the Republic of Gray, and passed down as family treasures. They are capable of gradually enhancing the physical abilities of their wielder, allowing him to break the boundaries of human limitations and gain supernatural power and speed. Because the effect is gradual, there is no sudden stress to the wielder's body. Each piece is called Blood and Rose, respectively. The names originated from the swirl of blood splatter and flower petals that follow whenever Fluss swings these twin swords. No other warrior has been able to utilize their potential as Fluss does.
treasures: A belt that Fluss's father gave him when he was appointed Vice Grand Master of the knights. It bears the Eye of the Storm spell that silences the wearer and its surroundings. - If you hear the sound of his sword, you'll soon see the petals flying before your eyes.
Perfume containing the first Vivienne roses of the year. Vivienne roses are beautiful but deadly. Those affected by the smell will hallucinate and just stare in awe as their opponent moves.

A rose that will never wither, even if it's been picked. It's a flower that Fluss loves. It reminds Fluss about the duty of a knight, which is the basis for his strong will that allows him to be confident in battle.

A confidential letter that has a wolf seal of the Empire on it. Fluss, who received the letter sealed by the Emperor, keeps it in safekeeping until it can be handed to the most esteemed princess of Orvel.
